  • Constructor Details

    • InfluxDbConnector

      public InfluxDbConnector​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String databaseName, java.lang.String scenarioName)

    • InfluxDbConnector

      public InfluxDbConnector​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String databaseName)
      Initializes a new InfluxDbConnector with the given url and databaseName and no scenario name. Consider using a scenario name if you plan to persist results using this connector.
      Parameters:
      url - the connection url for the influxDB database
      databaseName - the name of the database to which the connection should be established

    • InfluxDbConnector

      public InfluxDbConnector()
      Initializes a new InfluxDbConnector with the default URL "http://localhost:8086/", database name "ie3_in" and no scenario name

    • getSession

      public org.influxdb.InfluxDB getSession()
      Creates a session using the given connection parameters. If no database with the given name exists, one is created.
      Returns:
      autocloseable InfluxDB session

    • getScenarioName

    • parseQueryResult

      public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Set<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>>> parseQueryResult​(org.influxdb.dto.QueryResult queryResult)
      Parses the result of an influxQL query for all measurements (e.g. weather)
      Returns:
      a map of (measurement name to Set of maps of (field name to field value) for each result entity)

    • parseQueryResult

      public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Set<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>>> parseQueryResult​(org.influxdb.dto.QueryResult queryResult, java.lang.String... measurementNames)
      Parses the result of one or multiple influxQL queries for the given measurements (e.g. weather). If no measurement names are given, all results are parsed and returned
      Returns:
      a map of (measurement name to Set of maps of (field name to field value) for each result entity)

    • parseResult

      public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Set<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>>> parseResult​(org.influxdb.dto.QueryResult.Result result, java.lang.String... measurementNames)
      Parses the result of one influxQL query for the given measurements (e.g. weather). If no measurement names are given, all results are parsed and returned
      Returns:
      a map of (measurement name to Set of maps of (field name to field value) for each result entity)

    • parseSeries

      Parses the results for a single measurement series
      Returns:
      Set of maps of (field name to field value) for each result entity
